alert.note: Alert for Parker; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 24 at 4:54AM CDT until March 24 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Wise County in north central Texas... Northern Parker County in north central Texas... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 453 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Poolville, or 10 miles northeast of Mineral Wells, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Poolville around 500 AM CDT. Springtown around 510 AM CDT. Briar and Reno around 515 AM CDT. Boyd around 520 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Adell, Peaster, Agnes, Advance, Authon, Cottondale, Keeter, Sanctuary, Highland Addition and La Junta. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
